annotation.message: An operand identifier reference is hiding another identifier of the same name.
An operand identifier reference is hiding another identifier of the same name.
An operand identifier reference is hiding another identifier of the same name.

a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTMeningococcalPolyLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Meningococcal.Polysaccharide vaccines) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a meningococcal vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: Polysaccharide vaccines schedule (Polysaccharide vaccines can be used to control outbreaks in countries where limited economic resources or insufficient supply restrict the use of meningococcal conjugate vaccines) * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTMeningococcalPolyLogic

def.name: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

expression.name: Client's age is less than 2 years

def.name: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as client's age is less than 2 years. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.

a:s.a:s: 'Should not vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as client\'s age is less than 2 years. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.'

expression.value: Should not vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as client's age is less than 2 years. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.

def.name: Client is due for meningococcal vaccination

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for meningococcal vaccination

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

a:s.a:s: "No meningococcal primary series dose was administered"

operand.name: No meningococcal primary series dose was administered
Client's age is more than 2 years

def.name: Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for meningococcal vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as no meningococcal doses were administered and client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.

a:s.a:s: 'Should vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as no meningococcal doses were administered and client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.'

expression.value: Should vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as no meningococcal doses were administered and client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.

def.name: The primary series is complete. Client is not due for meningococcal booster dose.

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: The primary series is complete. Client is not due for meningococcal booster dose.

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

a:s.a:s: "One meningococcal primary series dose was administered"
"The latest meningococcal dose was administered less than 3 years ago"

operand.name: One meningococcal primary series dose was administered
The latest meningococcal dose was administered less than 3 years ago

def.name: The primary series is complete. Client is not due for meningococcal booster dose. Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: The primary series is complete. Client is not due for meningococcal booster dose. Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with meningococcal booster dose as the latest meningococcal dose was administered less than 3 years ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the booster dose.

a:s.a:s: 'Should not vaccinate client with meningococcal booster dose as the latest meningococcal dose was administered less than 3 years ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the booster dose.'

expression.value: Should not vaccinate client with meningococcal booster dose as the latest meningococcal dose was administered less than 3 years ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the booster dose.

def.name: The primary series is complete. Clinical judgement is required for meningococcal booster dose. Create a clinical note

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: The primary series is complete. Clinical judgement is required for meningococcal booster dose. Create a clinical note

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed"

a:s.a:s: "One meningococcal primary series dose was administered"
"The latest meningococcal dose was administered more than 3 years ago"

operand.name: One meningococcal primary series dose was administered
The latest meningococcal dose was administered more than 3 years ago
No meningococcal booster dose was administered

def.name: The primary series is complete. Clinical judgement is required for meningococcal booster dose. Create a clinical note Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: The primary series is complete. Clinical judgement is required for meningococcal booster dose. Create a clinical note Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: May administer meningococcal booster dose if the client is considered to be at continued high risk of exposure. Evaluate the client and use clinical judgement.

a:s.a:s: 'May administer meningococcal booster dose if the client is considered to be at continued high risk of exposure. Evaluate the client and use clinical judgement.'

expression.value: May administer meningococcal booster dose if the client is considered to be at continued high risk of exposure. Evaluate the client and use clinical judgement.

a:t.value: Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete"

def.name: Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete. One primary series dose and one booster dose have been administered. Check for any other vaccines due.

a:s.a:s: 'Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete. One primary series dose and one booster dose have been administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'

expression.value: Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete. One primary series dose and one booster dose have been administered. Check for any other vaccines due.

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for meningococcal vaccination"
'Should not vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as client\'s age is less than 2 years. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.'
'Should vaccinate client with first meningococcal dose as no meningococcal doses were administered and client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.'
"The primary series is complete. Client is not due for meningococcal booster dose."

'Should not vaccinate client with meningococcal booster dose as the latest meningococcal dose was administered less than 3 years ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the booster dose.'
"The primary series is complete. Clinical judgement is required for meningococcal booster dose. Create a clinical note"
'May administer meningococcal booster dose if the client is considered to be at continued high risk of exposure. Evaluate the client and use clinical judgement.'
'Meningococcal immunization schedule is complete. One primary series dose and one booster dose have been administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'
